org.openbase.bco.psc.control.registry

Class ControllableObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.psc.control.registry.ControllableObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openbase.jul.iface.Configurable<String,rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Identifiable<String>, org.openbase.jul.iface.provider.ConfigProvider<rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>

    public class ControllableObject
extends Object
implements org.openbase.jul.iface.Configurable<String,rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>
    This class represents a Unit which whose power state can be controlled.
    Author:
    Thoren Huppke

    • Method Detail

      • switchPowerState

        public boolean switchPowerState()
                         throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Switches the power state of the corresponding unit (from off to on and vice versa).
        Returns:
        true, if the power switch was successful.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown if something goes wrong during the power switch.
